doc.field: Jake Green National Maritime Union Photographs
Jake Green National Maritime Union Photographs

Two oversized (11x 19) b&w photographs: panoramic group shots of the Fourth Biennial Convention of the National Maritime Union, New York City, July 6, 1943, and the of the Sixth Convention NMU, September 22, 1947, also in New York City. In these photographs the following individuals have been identified: Danny Boano, Bill Penman, Bill McCarthy, and Stanley Postek.
